The movie was okay, I guess. It looked like a lot of it was shot on location, which is awesome considering the location. However, you can tell it had a fairly low budget. The only entity you actually see are just some poorly made up humans that just look, for the most part, like normal people with dirty, ripped up clothes.

From the allusions in the beginning and some of the more cutty action scenes, you'd think the monster would be some sort of huge mutant. Nope. It's zombie people. Disappointing ending.

@whymichael: Well thank you for  the brilliant insight anyway. I know I really give two shits from sunday if you like a movie or not. You've made quite the impact here. Hey have you ever fucked yourself? Try it.
